translations: v.装配（assemble 的过去分词）；集合

sentences.sentence: He preached to the assembled multitude.
sentences.translation: 他向聚集在那里的民众布道。

sentences.sentence: The manager has assembled a world-class team.
sentences.translation: 经理已聚集了一个世界一流的班子。

sentences.sentence: The workers were assembled in the hall.
